errors.error_description: The installation command includes 'nearley', an unrelated package. Lark can import grammars from Nearley.js, but does not require any 'nearley' pip package to be installed.
correction_candidates: Correct the command to `$ pip install lark --upgrade`.
Correct the command to `$ pip install lark-parser --upgrade`.
Correct the command to `$ pip install lark-nearley-converter --upgrade`.
Run the commands separately: `$ pip install lark --upgrade` and then `$ pip install nearley --upgrade`.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the command to `$ pip install lark --upgrade`.
